Posted By: RJDroid (10/10/2011 11:54:48 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Iliona! Veesa! Endry! The Vendilion Clique is absolutely amazing. A fast, highly efficient card with an aggressive power to boot. What makes the siblings so fantastic is that they can pry the minds of your opponents and make them get rid of their most prized card - this literally swings games for you. Of course you should always remember you can use their ability on yourself to cycle away cards that you don't need, for example a [Bitterblossom](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bitterblossom) when you're low on life. The Flash ability is just extra power. When you need a job done, call the siblings!
posts.html:

What makes the siblings so fantastic is that they can pry the minds of your opponents and make them get rid of their most prized card - this literally swings games for you. Of course you should always remember you can use their ability on yourself to cycle away cards that you don't need, for example a Bitterblossom when you're low on life. The Flash ability is just extra power. When you need a job done, call the siblings!

posts.post_content: So glad I just got a set of these for ~$60 :) Probably the single best card I've ever used in both Modern and Legacy. If you ever say that this card is only "OK" then you are horribly lying to yourself and have obviously never seen/known how to play this. There's a reason why this is one of the single most played cards in any format it's legal in.

Posted By: Megapossum (6/30/2012 10:46:26 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: IMO.. This is *The* Blue three drop to have.. And quite possibly and very debatably *The* three drop of all three drops! I've been playing on and off (mostly off) since Revised and just never really got IN to Blue decks, counter magic and hardcore control just wasn't my thing. But I bought some vintage boosters from half a dozen sets around the Scars of Mirrodin release time and pulled a duo of this guy, I'd been out of magic for.. 7-8 yrs at this point and when I opened the pack and saw it, I thought- Ok, that's decent. Then I checked the value here on the Orcish app and I was shocked! Could it be THAT good?! Read some comments and decided to build a blue black deck focused around control which includes some discard as well but also made discard a SOLID plan B, as you already know, this card is just.. Fantastic! Worth every penny of that price tag!
posts.html:
